comments.body: For reviewers. Release note change because the old one was inaccurate. See discussion in https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/issues/54254

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +491,495 @@  * The `--audit-policy-file` option is required if the `AdvancedAudit` feature is not explicitly turned off (`--feature-gates=AdvancedAudit=false`) on the API server.
  * The audit log file defaults to JSON encoding when using the advanced auditing feature gate.
  * An audit policy file without either an `apiVersion` or a `kind` field may be treated as invalid.
  * The webhook and log file now output the `v1beta1` event format.
